txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Gilded sword sheaths from the Susi-väki surrounding the encampment at Pynti-peldot. Deliver the items to Lauri, one of the Lossoth-scouts at the encampment in Forochel.
'These men who entreat with such beasts are an enemy of ours. Thank you.'

'The men who revere the wolf have long been an enemy in our hunting grounds, but the chill wind of the east has changed them, made them more aggressive, and now they strive to kill our people. Something must be done, and proof must be given.'
The Lossoth-scout Lauri at Pynti-peldot awaits the delivery of gilded sword sheaths.
Deliver the gilded sword sheaths to Lauri at Pynti-peldot in Forochel
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver gilded sword sheaths from the Gauredain surrounding the encampment of Pynti-peldot to Lauri, a Lossoth-scout.
Wanted: Gilded sword sheaths from the Susi-väki surrounding the encampment at Pynti-peldot.
